sentence.text: I started to feel drowsy .
If your child is drowsy or unconscious , lie the child on his or her side .
As he warmed up , and began to feel drowsy , that thin , bewildered voice rang round and round in his head .
The stove warms the tent up and we become drowsy , and oblivious to the storm outside .
` I am a little drowsy , that is all , a little tired with the journey , though I feel better than I thought I would .
Where Cannabis was grown as an important fibre crop in the Cambridgeshire fens , the workers in the hemp fields were known to become exceedingly drowsy .
The town itself lay some half a mile distant , its gentle grey houses clustered , in a hollow , on each side of the twining silver river , like a flock of drowsy sheep .
Her son discovered her in a drowsy state an hour later .
She felt heavy-lidded and drowsy , as if she had been asleep for a week .
One by one , he put the drowsy birds on to the top perch .
Now I 'm getting drowsy , the fire is burning low
Voices are also very commonly heard in this drowsy state , for instance , calling the sleeper 's name .
Indeed , never was I anywhere so idyllically drowsy .
She was already quite drowsy .
Sheila called her GP because for a week Mark had not been feeding properly , had become increasingly drowsy and was vomiting .
She was drowsy with the wine .
I felt that she was quite distressed by the birth -- she seemed drowsy and a bit blue .
She was beginning to feel a little drowsy , a combination of the effect of the wine and the amount of food she had consumed .
She looked at him with drowsy , yearning eyes .
She lifted drowsy blue eyes to his , bemused by the power he seemed to have over her .
At this point I was a little drowsy and the weakness in my joints had increased .
She kept the candle burning right up to the point where she felt drowsy , then blew it out .
They found Bertha in a slightly drowsy state that signified drugs were keeping severe pain at bay , while a long bulge beneath the bedclothes indicated that her leg was in a plaster cast .
After forty minutes at his ceiling of fifteen thousand feet , Killion felt drowsy and slow , like his aeroplane .
In my case I was very drowsy , I got constipated , they do n't tell you very much about this , they play it down .
